channel.title: data_sources on StatPREP Workshops 2019
channel.description: Recent content in data_sources on StatPREP Workshops 2019

item.title: Data sources
item.description: More documents at the data-sources directory Real data At the October 2018 StatPREP meeting at the Mathematical Association of America’s DC headquarters the new MAA deputy executive director, Rachel Levy asked a simple question: What’s real data? A core recommendation of the American Statistical Association’s GAISE report is to “use real data” when teaching statistics. Prof. Levy wasn’t looking to prompt a philosophical discussion of the nature of reality, but to define a benchmark.
